message:
SYSTEM: Deep_learning_applications_OEG.pdf: Página 38
LSTMs
Long Short Term Memory networks (LSTMs)
a special kind of RNN, capable of learning long-term 
dependencies
introduced by Hochreiter & Schmidhuber (1997)
deal with a great variety of problems
lots of variants (almost every paper involving LSTMs 
uses a slightly different version)
38
speaker: SYSTEM
